abstract: Will JPMorgan Chase’s stunning $2 a share deal to buy Bear Stearns put a crimp in Visa‘s plans to go public this week in what is expected to be the nation’s biggest initial public offering?
lead_paragraph: Will JPMorgan Chase’s stunning $2 a share deal to buy Bear Stearns put a crimp in Visa‘s plans to go public this week in what is expected to be the nation’s biggest initial public offering?

headline.main: Will Bear Deal Delay Visa Offering?
